update map_project
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update map_project set PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REGION_NAME = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_AMOUNT = #{areaAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into map_project (PROJECT_NAME, AREA, REGION_ID, REGION_NAME, AREA_AMOUNT, PRICE, VERSION, CREATE_DATE, DISABLED) values (#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0, now(),0)

select
from map_project where DISABLED = 0 and PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName}
